sentence.Network_en: We are sure that earthlike people do not live on Mars.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们肯定火星上没有类似地球人的人类生存.

sentence.Network_en: Scientists have discovered the first confirmed Earthlike planet outside our solar system, they announced Wednesday.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家们星期三声明, 他们已经发现了首颗太阳系外的经过确认的类地行星.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 根据CNN报导，科学家在周三(16日)首度证实，在太阳系外头找到一颗「类似地球」(Earthlike)的岩态行星。  天文学家阿堤．瀚兹(Arti…

means.word_mean: 1. earth colored; having a color of soil or earth;

auth_sentence.content: Could we put some acid eating bacteria in the outer atmosphere where it is more earthlike?
auth_sentence.res_content: Could we put some acid eating bacteria in the outer atmosphere where it is more earthlike?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Could we put some acid eating bacteria in the outer atmosphere where it is more earthlike?

auth_sentence.content: Three telescopes and inferometers to detect earthlike planets and develop superfast unmanned probes to investigate those planets.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three telescopes and inferometers to detect earthlike planets and develop superfast unmanned probes to investigate those planets.

auth_sentence.content: It had to be a different solar system though, because we already know there aren't any earthlike moons of Jupiter.
